T02TD2205E:168b-1: a'a rya badzra p'a ni n'i l'a mba ra dha ra sarba mandala bi dhi n'a ma aa ti /
T02TD2205E:168b-3: 'phags pa lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga thams cad rdzogs pa zhes bya ba //
T02TD2205E:168b-4: byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpa' 'grub pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2205E:168b-5: thams cad stong pa chen po'i mchog / mnga' brnyes phyag na rdo rje la //
T02TD2205E:168b-6: kun nas dang bas phyag 'tshal te ;
T02TD2205E:168b-7: / dkyil 'khor cho ga bdag gis bshad //
T02TD2205E:168b-8: rkyen thub sa non yan lag rdzogs //
T02TD2205E:168b-9: ting 'dzin dbang thob gzugs bzang zhing //
T02TD2205E:168b-10: log pa'i lam spangs mang pos bkur //
T02TD2205E:168b-11: de sogs yon tan kun ldan pas //
T02TD2205E:168b-12: yid dang mthun pa'i dben pa'am //
T02TD2205E:168b-13: yang na nyams dga' bkra shis gnas //
T02TD2205E:168b-14: ri zlum dag gam chu bo'i 'gram //
T02TD2205E:168b-15: byin che yon tan lnga gnas su //
T02TD2205E:168b-16: stegs bu sngon po mdzes pa la //
T02TD2205E:168b-17: me tog sngon po gcal bkram ste //
T02TD2205E:168b-18: steng du gos sngon sku gzugs gzhag //
T02TD2205E:168b-19: yan lag ye shes bskyed ldan pas //
T02TD2205E:168b-20: mchod pa'i cho ga sngon btang nas ;
T02TD2205E:168b-21: / phyi nang dgug dang bstims la gnas //
T02TD2205E:168b-22: sngags kyi bsnyen pa 'bum sogs bya //
T02TD2205E:168b-23: yang na mtshan ma gsum thob pas //
T02TD2205E:168b-24: bsgrub pa'i cho ga brtsams par bya //
T02TD2205E:168b-25: rab tu brtags pa'i sa gzhi la //
T02TD2205E:168b-26: zlum la mdzes pa'i mandala brtsig //
T02TD2205E:168b-27: steng du dpal ldan dkyil 'khor bskyed ;
T02TD2205E:168b-28: / spyan drang byin brlabs dbang bskur nas //
T02TD2205E:168b-29: phyi nang mchod pa ci 'byor dbul //
T02TD2205E:168b-30: stong pa dag kyang de bzhin no //
T02TD2205E:168b-31: de nas phyogs skyong srung ma dgug //
T02TD2205E:168b-32: aom aindra ye h'um dza: aagrna ye h'um dza: ya m'a ya h'um dza: nee rra ty'a aa h'um dza: ba ru n'a ya h'um dza: ba ya be h'um dza: / ku be r'a ya h'um dza: / a'i shva n'a ya h'um dza: te ha aa dhi pa ta ye h'um dza: s'urya tsandr'a ya h'um dza: de skad ces brjod la spyan drang ngo //
T02TD2205E:168b-33: de nas sangs rgyas thams cad dgug //
T02TD2205E:168b-34: phyogs skyong lo sogs byin gyis brlab //
T02TD2205E:168b-35: gtor ma tshul bzhin byin brlabs te //
T02TD2205E:168b-36: ci bder phyogs skyong tshogs la dbul //
T02TD2205E:169a-0: @169a * // de nas las rnams bcol bar bya //
T02TD2205E:169a-1: lha dbang me lha gshin rje dang //
T02TD2205E:169a-2: bden bral chu lha rlung gi lha //
T02TD2205E:169a-3: gnod sbyin dbang ldan nyi zla dang //
T02TD2205E:169a-4: bran dang bka' nyan pho nya'i tshogs //
T02TD2205E:169a-5: rdo rje spyan dang snyan mnga' ba //
T02TD2205E:169a-6: rdzu 'phrul chen po'i don ldan pa //
T02TD2205E:169a-7: mngon shes can gyis mchod ba bzhes //
T02TD2205E:169a-8: sa phyogs dge ba'i gnas 'di ru //
T02TD2205E:169a-9: bdag gi dge ba'i grogs po mdzod //
T02TD2205E:169a-10: bdag gis bzod pa de yis ni //
T02TD2205E:169a-11: mi bslu dam tshig dgongs mdzad la //
T02TD2205E:169a-12: rtags dang mtshan ma bstan du gsol //
T02TD2205E:169a-14: lag pa sa la reg pa yis //
T02TD2205E:169a-15: sa yi lha mo dbus su bton //
T02TD2205E:169a-16: de la byin brlabs mchod pa bya //
T02TD2205E:169a-17: dngos su las bcol tshig 'di bsgo'o //
T02TD2205E:169a-18: skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02TD2205E:169a-19: spyod pa'i tshul dang khyad par las //
T02TD2205E:169a-20: sa dang pha rol phyin la //
T02TD2205E:169a-21: lha mo khyod ni dbang du gyur //
T02TD2205E:169a-23: ji ltar bdud kyi sde bcom pa//
T02TD2205E:169a-24: de ltar bdag gis bdud las ni //
T02TD2205E:169a-25: rgyal bar byas te dkyil 'khor bri //
T02TD2205E:169a-26: zhes brjod pas gnang ba byin nas thim par bsam mo //
T02TD2205E:169a-28: legs par byin pa'i gnas ched du //
T02TD2205E:169a-29: sa bdag legs par blta byas la //
T02TD2205E:169a-30: zla bzhir dbang du phyogs bzhir blta //
T02TD2205E:169a-31: de yi lto ba'i dbus nas bru ;
T02TD2205E:169a-32: / rol sogs pa'i skyon rnams bsla //
T02TD2205E:169a-33: mar gyi mdog dang 'dres par gyur //
T02TD2205E:169a-34: mchog tu gyur bas blangs par bya //
T02TD2205E:169a-36: sa gzhi bzang pos bkang du dus su //
T02TD2205E:169a-37: dag par byed pa'i gsang sngags bzlas //
T02TD2205E:169a-38: stegs kun bu khru ni bcu drug gam //
T02TD2205E:169a-39: bcu'am lnga ru legs byas te ;
T02TD2205E:169a-40: / shin tu 'thas par bcag par bya //
T02TD2205E:169a-41: mthon dman med par gyur pa dang //
T02TD2205E:169a-42: bdud rtsi lnga'am pa yi lnga //
T02TD2205E:169a-43: dri dang sman gyis legs par byur //
T02TD2205E:169a-44: bdag bskyed gsang sngags bzlas pa yis //
T02TD2205E:169a-45: rtsa ba'i yi ges grub par bya //
T02TD2205E:169a-47: de nas sa las 'od byung ste / yam las rgya gram rlung du gyur //
T02TD2205E:169a-48: de steng bam las chu dkyil 'khor //
T02TD2205E:169a-49: gser gyi sa gzhi lam las bskyed //
T02TD2205E:169a-50: de steng sum las ri rab bskyed //
T02TD2205E:169a-51: rin chen sna bzhi'i rang bzhin can //
T02TD2205E:169a-52: de la lag brdeg par yba //
T02TD2205E:169a-53: de yis gsang sngags 'di dag bzlas //
T02TD2205E:169a-54: aom me d'i n'i badzr'a bha bandha ni h'um phat /
T02TD2205E:169b-0: @169b ces bzlas 'od dang ldan byas te /
T02TD2205E:169b-1: 'do kyis stong gsum thams cad gsal //
T02TD2205E:169b-2: sa gzhi byin gyis brlab pa'o //
T02TD2205E:169b-3: deng nas brtsams te gos sngon can //
T02TD2205E:169b-4: phyag rgya che dang ldan gyur pas //
T02TD2205E:169b-5: rgyan rnams thams cad yang dag ldan //
T02TD2205E:169b-6: padma la sogs dbus bting nas //
T02TD2205E:169b-7: de yi steng du 'dug par bya //
T02TD2205E:169b-8: shar la sogs pa'i phyogs rnams su //
T02TD2205E:169b-9: mchod pa lnga 'am nyi shu brgyad //
T02TD2205E:169b-10: bdag gi thugs ka'i 'od zer gyis //
T02TD2205E:169b-11: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas spyan drangs te //
T02TD2205E:169b-12: bstim pas bkrag dang gzi byin bskyed //
T02TD2205E:169b-13: mngal nas skyes pa'i tshul can nam //
T02TD2205E:169b-14: sna bug sngags kyi 'od zer las //
T02TD2205E:169b-15: yang na nyi zar tshul can gyis //
T02TD2205E:169b-16: 'khor rnams gsal bar gyur pa las //
T02TD2205E:169b-17: ye shes bde bshegs spyan drangs bstim //
T02TD2205E:169b-19: gsang bdag dkyil 'khor chen po'i phyir //
T02TD2205E:169b-20: bdag nis chen bzung bar byed //
T02TD2205E:169b-21: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis //
T02TD2205E:169b-22: bdag la byin gyis brlab tu gsol //
T02TD2205E:169b-24: dbang thob gyur nas gsang sngags bzlas //
T02TD2205E:169b-25: sku yi 'od kyis gsang sngags rgyal //
T02TD2205E:169b-26: reg pas bdud dang srin po 'bros //
T02TD2205E:169b-27: bsam gtan las ma yengs pas //
T02TD2205E:169b-28: sngags kyi phreng bas bzlas ba bya //
T02TD2205E:169b-29: zhes ba ni sa gzung ba'i cho ga'o //
T02TD2205E:169b-30: de nas phyogs bzhir rnal 'byor bzhi //
T02TD2205E:169b-31: khams gsum rnam rgyal la sogs bsam //
T02TD2205E:169b-32: shar nas gtso la mchod pa phul //
T02TD2205E:169b-33: gsol ba 'di yang gdab par bya //
T02TD2205E:169b-34: rdo rje rigs mchog dpal ldan gos sngon can //
T02TD2205E:169b-35: dpal ldan dkyil 'khor chen po bri ba'i phyir //
T02TD2205E:169b-36: mnyam ba'i ngag las 'bar ba'i skur bzhengs la //
T02TD2205E:169b-37: zhe snang rigs kyi bgegs rnams bzlog tu gsol //
T02TD2205E:169b-38: zhes gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2205E:169b-39: lho nas gtso la mchod pa phul //
T02TD2205E:169b-40: gsol ba 'di dag gdab par bya //
T02TD2205E:169b-41: aom rin chen rigs mchog dpal ldan gos sngon can ;
T02TD2205E:169b-42: / dpal ldan rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gri ba'i phyir //
T02TD2205E:169b-43: mnyam pa'i ngang las 'bar ba'i skur bzhengs la //
T02TD2205E:169b-44: nga rgyal rigs kyi bgegs rnams bzlog tu gsol //
T02TD2205E:169b-45: zhes gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2205E:169b-46: nub nas gtol mchod phul la //
T02TD2205E:169b-47: gsol ba'i dag gdab par bya //
T02TD2205E:170a-0: @170a * // aom padma'i rigs mchog dpal ldan gos sngon can //
T02TD2205E:170a-1: padma'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor bri ba'i phyir //
T02TD2205E:170a-2: mnyam pa'i ngang las 'bar ba'i skur bzhengs la //
T02TD2205E:170a-3: 'dod chags rigs kyi bgegs rnams bzlog tu gsol //
T02TD2205E:170a-4: zhes gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2205E:170a-5: byang nas gtso la mchod pa dbul //
T02TD2205E:170a-6: gsol ba 'di dag gdab par bya //
T02TD2205E:170a-7: aom las kyi rigs mchog dpal ldan gos sngon can //
T02TD2205E:170a-8: las kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor bri ba'i phyir //
T02TD2205E:170a-9: mnyam pa'i ngang las 'bar ba'i skur bzhengs la //
T02TD2205E:170a-10: phrag dog rigs kyi bgegs rnams bzlog tu gsol //
T02TD2205E:170a-11: zhes gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2205E:170a-12: de nas phyogs bzhi'i khro bo bzhis //
T02TD2205E:170a-13: dkyil 'khor gtso la gsol ba gdab //
T02TD2205E:170a-14: mnyes pa'i tshogs kyang ci nus byas //
T02TD2205E:170a-17: de ni gtso bo bslang ba'i cho ga'o //
T02TD2205E:170a-18: deng nas brtsams te gos sngon can //
T02TD2205E:170a-19: shin tu khro ba'i gzugs su langs //
T02TD2205E:170a-20: mig gnyis nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor du //
T02TD2205E:170a-21: ram dang aa gnyis bsam par bya //
T02TD2205E:170a-22: rkang par ljang gu yig h'um las //
T02TD2205E:170a-23: sna tshos rdo rje 'od ldan bsam //
T02TD2205E:170a-24: mig dang rna ba'i nang du yang //
T02TD2205E:170a-25: khro bo'i tshogs ni bsam par bya //
T02TD2205E:170a-26: nga rgyal chen po bskyed nas ni ;
T02TD2205E:170a-27: / rdo rje dril bu bskor bya zhing //
T02TD2205E:170a-28: rkang ba rdo rje'i stabs ldan pas //
T02TD2205E:170a-29: phyogs mtshams su ni blta bya ste //
T02TD2205E:170a-30: h'um zhes 'jigs pa'i sgra sgrogs bsam //
T02TD2205E:170a-31: ha ha'i gad mi chen po dgong //
T02TD2205E:170a-33: g-yon pa'i dril bu dkur brten nas //
T02TD2205E:170a-34: g-yas bas rdo rje gsor byas te //
T02TD2205E:170a-35: sangs rgyas thams cad mdun bsams te //
T02TD2205E:170a-36: bka' bsgom bden par brdar bar bya //
T02TD2205E:170a-37: gang dag sa phyogs 'di na gnas pa'i //
T02TD2205E:170a-41: lto 'phye'i tshogs la sogs thams cad ma gnas par dengs shig //
T02TD2205E:170a-42: h'um nga ni dpal ldan gos sngon can //
T02TD2205E:170a-43: sangs rgyas kun gyis gnang ba ste //
T02TD2205E:170a-44: lha dang klu dang lha ma yin //
T02TD2205E:170a-45: brjed byed la sogs bgegs kyi tshogs //
T02TD2205E:170a-47: gal te dam tshig las 'das na //
T02TD2205E:170a-48: stobs chen khro bo gos sngon gyis //
T02TD2205E:170b-0: klad pa 'gas par @170b gdon mi za //
T02TD2205E:170b-1: phat na ma: sa ma nta k'a ya b'a ka tsi tta badrza n'a //
T02TD2205E:170b-2: na mo n'i l'a mbar h'um //
T02TD2205E:170b-10: spo ta ya spo ta ya /
T02TD2205E:170b-11: sarba bigh'an bi n'a ya k'a n'a /
T02TD2205E:170b-12: ma h'a ga na pha ti dz'i bant'a nta ka r'a ya h'um phat /
T02TD2205E:170b-14: / dpal ldan gos sngon snying po las //
T02TD2205E:170b-15: yi ge lnga yi sbyor ba yis //
T02TD2205E:170b-16: mtshon cha lnga yis thog phab pas //
T02TD2205E:170b-17: gdug pa thams cad brgyal bar 'gyur //
T02TD2205E:170b-19: de nas rkang pa rdo rje'i stabs //
T02TD2205E:170b-20: lag pa gar stabs bskor ba yis //
T02TD2205E:170b-21: dbang ldan gyi phyogs nas brtsams te ;
T02TD2205E:170b-22: / rdo rje bskor ba la na gsum mam //
T02TD2205E:170b-23: yang na ji ltar nus pa yis //
T02TD2205E:170b-24: bsrung ba khro bo'i khang par bsam //
T02TD2205E:170b-26: deng nas brtsam te dkyil 'khor gyi //
T02TD2205E:170b-27: lha yi sta gon bya bar gsungs //
T02TD2205E:170b-28: bdud rtsi lnga yi thig le yis //
T02TD2205E:170b-29: thig le lha yi gnas su ni //
T02TD2205E:170b-30: gdan du bsams la dbab par bya //
T02TD2205E:170b-31: de steng h'um las phyag mtshan gyur //
T02TD2205E:170b-32: de las so sor skur rdzogs te //
T02TD2205E:170b-33: dbang bskur byin gyis brlab par bya //
T02TD2205E:170b-34: de la phyi rin nga mchod pa dbul //
T02TD2205E:170b-35: bstod pa dag kyang de bzhin no //
T02TD2205E:170b-36: de nas gsol ba gdab par bya //
T02TD2205E:170b-37: bcom ldan rdo rje gos sngon can //
T02TD2205E:170b-38: rig sngags rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2205E:170b-39: bdag gi snying rje'i dkyil 'khor ni //
T02TD2205E:170b-40: mgon po bri bar 'dod pa ste /
T02TD2205E:170b-41: slon ma rnams la phan phyir dang //
T02TD2205E:170b-42: khyed la mchod pa'i don du yang //
T02TD2205E:170b-43: de la bcom ldan gus bdag la //
T02TD2205E:170b-44: byin brlabs gnang ba mdzad par 'os //
T02TD2205E:170b-45: dgongs shig bcom ldan gos sngon can //
T02TD2205E:170b-47: bgegs rnams ma lus 'dul ba'i bdag //
T02TD2205E:170b-48: gsang sngags rig sngags kun gyi lha //
T02TD2205E:170b-49: bdag la byin gyis brlab tu gsol //
T02TD2205E:170b-50: bdag ni slob ma rnams kyi phyir //
T02TD2205E:170b-51: dpal ldan gos sngon dkyil 'khor bri //
T02TD2205E:170b-52: bdag dang slob mar bcas pa rnams //
T02TD2205E:170b-53: thugs rjes nye bar gzung du gsol //
T02TD2205E:170b-54: bdag par du gcod pa'i bgegs //
T02TD2205E:170b-55: 'byung po sha za gnod sbyin dang //
T02TD2205E:170b-56: gang dag gnod sbyin sems ldan pa //
T02TD2205E:170b-57: thams cad bdag la bsrung du gsol //
T02TD2205E:170b-58: thun mong dngos grub thams cad dang //
T02TD2205E:170b-59: de bzhin mchog tu gyur pa dang //
T02TD2205E:171a-2: bdag la myur du stsal du gsol //
T02TD2205E:171a-3: de skad ces gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2205E:171a-4: dkyil 'khor gyi lha sta gon gyi cho ga'o //
T02TD2205E:171a-5: deng nas brtsams te gos sngon gyi //
T02TD2205E:171a-6: rin chen dngul gyi bum pa'am //
T02TD2205E:171a-7: yang na dkar po khams sogs la //
T02TD2205E:171a-8: nag bo dang ni ra ri med //
T02TD2205E:171a-9: de lta bu yi bum pa la //
T02TD2205E:171a-10: padma brgyad dang ldan pa yi //
T02TD2205E:171a-11: dbus su so so'i snying po'am //
T02TD2205E:171a-12: yang na so so'i phyag mtshan dgong //
T02TD2205E:171a-13: de nyid 'od du zhu ba las //
T02TD2205E:171a-14: dkar po yi ni yi ge ba //
T02TD2205E:171a-15: de las bum pa'i gzhal yas khang //
T02TD2205E:171a-16: nang du padma nyi zla'i gdan //
T02TD2205E:171a-17: lto che mgrin pa ring ba dang //
T02TD2205E:171a-18: mchu ni kang ka'i dbyibs can la //
T02TD2205E:171a-19: dbus su so so'i snying po bsam //
T02TD2205E:171a-20: de nas phyag mtshan sku rdzogs 'gyur //
T02TD2205E:171a-21: mi dmigs dbyings nas sangs rgyas bskul //
T02TD2205E:171a-22: gnyis med gyur la mchod pa dbul //
T02TD2205E:171a-23: gong ma'i gsol ba gdab bar bya //
T02TD2205E:171a-24: de nas sman lnga 'bru lnga dang//
T02TD2205E:171a-25: rin chen lnga dang snying po lnga //
T02TD2205E:171a-26: thun mong bum pa'i rdzas su blugs //
T02TD2205E:171a-27: rnam rgyal bum par lha tshogs bskyed //
T02TD2205E:171a-28: btung ba snum po dag dang ni //
T02TD2205E:171a-29: mi 'chi ldan kyang dgang bar bya //
T02TD2205E:171a-30: las kyi bum par khams gsum rgyal //
T02TD2205E:171a-31: 'od zhu de yis las kun byed //
T02TD2205E:171a-32: sngags ni so so'i snying po'o//
T02TD2205E:171a-33: de nas bum pa thams cad kun //
T02TD2205E:171a-34: dpag bsam shing dang 'bras bu can //
T02TD2205E:171a-35: yon tan ldan pas kha brgyan nas //
T02TD2205E:171a-36: de ni ma nyams ras dag la //
T02TD2205E:171a-37: kha dog lnga dang ldan pa yis //
T02TD2205E:171a-38: rnam rgyal bum pa bca' bar bya //
T02TD2205E:171a-39: gzhan ma kha dog re re'o //
T02TD2205E:171a-40: shar du 'dab ma brgyad pa yi //
T02TD2205E:171a-41: mandala byas te de ru bzhag / bum pa sta gon gyi cho ga'o //
T02TD2205E:171a-42: de nas slobs ma brtag pa'i cho ga bya ste /
T02TD2205E:171a-43: chags dang grol ba'i gang zag ni //
T02TD2205E:171a-44: lhag par gnas pa gcig tu gyur //
T02TD2205E:171a-45: dang por phyi nang khrus byas te //
T02TD2205E:171a-46: dri zhim phyugs la gos bzang brgyan //
T02TD2205E:171a-47: de nas dkyil 'khor phyi rim dgod //
T02TD2205E:171a-48: slob dpon la ni gsol ba gdab ;
T02TD2205E:171a-49: / ston pa khyod la bdag dga'o //
T02TD2205E:171a-50: slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol //
T02TD2205E:171a-51: byang chub sems dpa'i tshul bstan pa //
T02TD2205E:171a-52: byang chub sems kyang bdag la skya'o //
T02TD2205E:171a-53: de nyid dam tshig bdag la stsol //
T02TD2205E:171a-54: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun dang //
T02TD2205E:171b-0: bla na med dkon mchog @171b gsum ;
T02TD2205E:171b-1: / skyabs gsum dag kyang bdag la stsol //
T02TD2205E:171b-2: thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu //
T02TD2205E:171b-3: mgon po bdag ni gzhug tu gsol //
T02TD2205E:171b-5: bu tshur theg pa chen po yi //
T02TD2205E:171b-6: gsang sngags spyod pa'i tshig 'di ni //
T02TD2205E:171b-7: khyod la yang dag bshad par bya //
T02TD2205E:171b-8: tshul chen khyod kyis shes par gyis //
T02TD2205E:171b-10: de nas sdig ba bshags pa dang /
T02TD2205E:171b-11: rjes su yi rang ba dang //
T02TD2205E:171b-12: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang /
T02TD2205E:171b-13: mya ngan las mi 'da' bar gsol ba gdab pa dang //
T02TD2205E:171b-14: byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed pa dang /
T02TD2205E:171b-15: lus dbul ba ni gzhan du shes par bya'o //
T02TD2205E:171b-16: de'i rjes la sdom pa pog la 'dzin du gzhug /
T02TD2205E:171b-17: bslab pa yi ni tshul khrims dang //
T02TD2205E:171b-18: dge ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang //
T02TD2205E:171b-19: sems can don byed tshul khrims gsum //
T02TD2205E:171b-20: deng nas brtsams te gzung bar bya //
T02TD2205E:171b-21: rdo rje rigs mchog chen po la //
T02TD2205E:171b-22: rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya yang //
T02TD2205E:171b-23: yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi //
T02TD2205E:171b-24: slob dpon dag kyang bkur bar bgyi//
T02TD2205E:171b-25: rin chen rigs mchog chen po yi //
T02TD2205E:171b-26: dam tshig yid du 'ong ba la //
T02TD2205E:171b-27: nyid re bzhin du dus drug tu //
T02TD2205E:171b-28: sbyin pa rnam bzhi rtag tu sbyin //
T02TD2205E:171b-29: byang chub chen po las byung ba'i //
T02TD2205E:171b-30: padma'i rigs mchog dam pa la //
T02TD2205E:171b-31: phyi nang gsar ba theg pa gsum //
T02TD2205E:171b-32: yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi //
T02TD2205E:171b-33: las kyi rigs mchog chen po la //
T02TD2205E:171b-34: sngom pa tham cad ldan par ni //
T02TD2205E:171b-35: yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi //
T02TD2205E:171b-36: sems can kun gyi ngon gyi phyir //
T02TD2205E:171b-37: bdag gis sdom pa ma lus gzung //
T02TD2205E:171b-40: phyag rgya che dang ldan gyur nas //
T02TD2205E:171b-41: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas rnams su //
T02TD2205E:171b-42: dri yi thig le re re gdab //
T02TD2205E:171b-43: lha rnams kyi ni gdan du bsam //
T02TD2205E:171b-44: spyi gtsug bde gshegs gos sngon can //
T02TD2205E:171b-45: mgrin par padma'i gos sngon can //
T02TD2205E:171b-46: snying gar thugs kyi gos sngo can //
T02TD2205E:171b-47: lte bar rin chen gos sngon can //
T02TD2205E:171b-48: gsang bar las kyi gos sngon can //
T02TD2205E:171b-49: dpung pa la sogs rkang lag bzhi //
T02TD2205E:171b-50: khams gsum rnam rgyal la sogs brtag / de nas spos dang me tog dang //
T02TD2205E:171b-51: mar me dri dang rnam lnga dbul //
T02TD2205E:171b-52: dri yi chu la bdud rtsi'am //
T02TD2205E:171b-53: khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba bskyed //
T02TD2205E:171b-54: bcu gcig 'od zhu dag pa'i chus //
T02TD2205E:172a-2: bdud rtsi'i chu yang blud par bya //
T02TD2205E:172a-3: de nas srung skud byin brlabs te //
T02TD2205E:172a-4: dag pa'i chu gtor 'od zhu pas //
T02TD2205E:172a-5: khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba bskyed //
T02TD2205E:172a-6: bkug nas 'od du zhu ba las //
T02TD2205E:172a-8: de la mdud pa drug byas te //
T02TD2205E:172a-9: mdud pa re la lha re bstim //
T02TD2205E:172a-10: rdo rje de nyid sngags kyis grub //
T02TD2205E:172a-11: dpung ba g-yon par gdags bya'o //
T02TD2205E:172a-12: de nas so shing byin brlabs te //
T02TD2205E:172a-13: au du mb'a ra pa sha'i shing //
T02TD2205E:172a-15: sor bcu gnyis pa'i tshad du bya'o //
T02TD2205E:172a-16: 'od zhu bskyed pa god bzhin te //
T02TD2205E:172a-17: shar du kha bltas mi smra bar //
T02TD2205E:172a-18: bca' dang bru ba'i cho ga bya //
T02TD2205E:172a-19: bsam pas byang chub sems bskyed de //
T02TD2205E:172a-20: rtags ni gsum du shes par bya //
T02TD2205E:172a-21: dang po 'jug pa'i rtags bstan te //
T02TD2205E:172a-22: bor bas slob dpon la bltas na //
T02TD2205E:172a-23: de ni 'jug tu rung bar bshad //
T02TD2205E:172a-24: gal te rang la bltas gyur na //
T02TD2205E:172a-25: de ni phyir yang dor bar bya //
T02TD2205E:172a-26: gnyis pa bgegs kyi rtags rnams lta //
T02TD2205E:172a-27: gsum pa dngos grub grub rtags ni //
T02TD2205E:172a-28: sor mo'am ni bor ba'i tshe //
T02TD2205E:172a-30: shar du yang ni de bzhin te //
T02TD2205E:172a-31: mtshams dang byang du bltas na //
T02TD2205E:172a-32: zhi ba la sogs dngos grub 'gyur //
T02TD2205E:172a-33: de nas dag gi nyes pa sbyang //
T02TD2205E:172a-34: de nas ku sha byin brlabs te /
T02TD2205E:172a-35: khams gsum rgyal po'i khro bo dang //
T02TD2205E:172a-36: las kyi gos sngon phyag rgya sngags //
T02TD2205E:172a-37: de yis byin brlabs sngas dang stan //
T02TD2205E:172a-38: de steng seng ge'i stabs kyis nyal //
T02TD2205E:172a-39: sbor ba bskyed pa'i cho ga bya //
T02TD2205E:172a-40: sangs rgyas chos dang mthun 'gyur ba'i //
T02TD2205E:172a-41: au dumbh'a ra'i me tog ni //
T02TD2205E:172a-43: skye ba 'di yis thob pa yis //
T02TD2205E:172a-44: 'bras bu rdo rje'i theg pa'i chos //
T02TD2205E:172a-46: gsang sngags don 'di thob pa yis //
T02TD2205E:172a-47: dga' ba thams cad mthar phyin te //
T02TD2205E:172a-49: bcom ldan rdo rje 'dzin pa che //
T02TD2205E:172a-50: thogs pa med pa'i sku brnyes pa //
T02TD2205E:172a-51: 'di yi tshul gyis mngon par bsgrub //
T02TD2205E:172a-52: sems can skal ba ngan pa yis //
T02TD2205E:172a-53: de yi ming yang thos mi 'gyur //
T02TD2205E:172a-54: spyad par 'gyur bas mos ci dgos //
T02TD2205E:172a-55: sang gi nyin mo khyed rnams kun //
T02TD2205E:172b-0: @172b dkyil 'khor bzang po mthong ba yis //
T02TD2205E:172b-1: bla med mchog la reg par 'gyur //
T02TD2205E:172b-2: zhes spro ba bskyed pa'i chos gzhan yang bshad par bya'o //
T02TD2205E:172b-3: nang par sngar ni ba'o can langs //
T02TD2205E:172b-4: rmi lam ci mthong dra bar bya //
T02TD2205E:172b-5: gos sngon sku gzugs mthor ba dang //
T02TD2205E:172b-6: ri bo'i steng du 'dug pa dang //
T02TD2205E:172b-7: mchod rten skas la 'dzeg pa dang //
T02TD2205E:172b-8: me tog steng na 'dug pa dang //
T02TD2205E:172b-9: chos kyi 'gro gleng byed pa dang //
T02TD2205E:172b-10: glegs bam dag la spyod pa dang //
T02TD2205E:172b-11: gzhan gyi dbang bskur dkyil 'khor mthong //
T02TD2205E:172b-12: de dang gzhan yang bzang 'gyur rang //
T02TD2205E:172b-13: yi rang tshig brjod gal te rtags //
T02TD2205E:172b-14: mi gsal ba ru gyur pa na ;
T02TD2205E:172b-15: / nyams pa rnams ni bskang par bya //
T02TD2205E:172b-16: gal te bar chos rtags byung na //
T02TD2205E:172b-17: drag po'i sbyin sreg bya ba dang //
T02TD2205E:172b-18: drag po'i chogs dang 'khor los bzlog / gong ma'i rtags dang ldan 'gyur par //
T02TD2205E:172b-19: thig gdab pa yi tshogs bya //
T02TD2205E:172b-20: thig skung kha dog lnga ldan la //
T02TD2205E:172b-21: yi ge lngas ni byin brlabs te //
T02TD2205E:172b-22: de las rigs lnga'i sku ru gyur //
T02TD2205E:172b-23: ye shes rigs lnga bkug cing bstim //
T02TD2205E:172b-24: 'od zhu thig skud sna sngar grub //
T02TD2205E:172b-25: yang na ye shes byang chub sems //
T02TD2205E:172b-26: kha dog lnga dang ldan bar dgug / des ni nam mkha'i thig gdab bo //
T02TD2205E:172b-27: sa yi thig kyang 'di lta ste //
T02TD2205E:172b-28: dang po tshangs pa'i thig gnyis gdab //
T02TD2205E:172b-29: de bzhin 'khor lo rnams brgyad dang //
T02TD2205E:172b-30: gru chad khyams dang sgo bzhi dang /
T02TD2205E:172b-31: rta babs la sogs so sor dbye //
T02TD2205E:172b-32: de nas nad du phur bu gdab //
T02TD2205E:172b-33: mtha' skor dag ni gnyis su bskor //
T02TD2205E:172b-34: nang gi snam bu'i nang du ni //
T02TD2205E:172b-35: chu chud gcig la skor gnyis ba skor //
T02TD2205E:172b-36: dbus su bskor ba gcig dang ldan /
T02TD2205E:172b-37: de nas rtul chon brtsam par bya //
T02TD2205E:172b-38: dbus su mthing ga shar du dkar //
T02TD2205E:172b-41: byang gi padma ljang gur bya //
T02TD2205E:172b-42: mtshams ni mthing gar yang dag lnga //
T02TD2205E:172b-43: 'khor lo'i mdog kyang de bzhin no //
T02TD2205E:172b-44: dbus su rdo rje dgod ba ste //
T02TD2205E:172b-45: shar du 'khor lo dgod par bya //
T02TD2205E:172b-46: lhor ni rin chen 'bar ba dgong //
T02TD2205E:172b-47: nub tu padma dmar po ste //
T02TD2205E:172b-48: byang du sna tshogs rdo rje ste //
T02TD2205E:172b-50: mtshams rnams su ni khams gsum rgyal //
T02TD2205E:172b-51: mgon po 'phags skyes rnam thos sras //
T02TD2205E:173a-2: gru tshad dang ni lha mo mtshan //
T02TD2205E:173a-3: kha dog ljang gu'i tshon gyis bya //
T02TD2205E:173a-4: khyams kyi shar ni dkar po bya //
T02TD2205E:173a-5: lto ser nub ni rnam par dmar //
T02TD2205E:173a-6: byang gi khyams ni lhang gu'o //
T02TD2205E:173a-7: khyams te ji bzhin sgo de bzhin //
T02TD2205E:173a-8: shar gyi sgor ni lcags kyu ste //
T02TD2205E:173a-9: lhor ni zhags ba nub lcags sgrog //
T02TD2205E:173a-10: byang gi sgor ni dri la bug tong //
T02TD2205E:173a-11: sgo khrung phyi rol la sogs pa //
T02TD2205E:173a-12: khyams dang pha gu dra ba dang //
T02TD2205E:173a-13: dra ba phyed bas rnams par brgyan //
T02TD2205E:173a-14: rta babs bzhi yang de bzhin te //
T02TD2205E:173a-15: tva ra na bzhi yis kyang brgyan //
T02TD2205E:173a-16: ri mo'i tshogs rdzogs gyur nas //
T02TD2205E:173a-17: dam tshig 'khor lo rdzogs par byed //
T02TD2205E:173a-18: ye shes 'khor lo bkug gnas bstim //
T02TD2205E:173a-19: de nas mchod pa'i tsho ga brtsam //
T02TD2205E:173a-20: badzra dh'u ba sngags las byung //
T02TD2205E:173a-21: dkar mo spos kyis shangs la dbul //
T02TD2205E:173a-23: mthing ga me tog sku la gtor //
T02TD2205E:173a-24: badzra a'a lo ke sngags las byung //
T02TD2205E:173a-25: dmar mo mar mes dkyil 'khor gsal //
T02TD2205E:173a-27: ljang gu dri chab phyag zhabs bsil //
T02TD2205E:173a-28: de la sogs pa'i mchod pa'i tshogs //
T02TD2205E:173a-29: ci 'byor thams cad dbul bar bya //
T02TD2205E:173a-30: dang por sems bskyed phyag 'tshal nas //
T02TD2205E:173a-31: skyabs gsol sngom pa gzung bar bya //
T02TD2205E:173a-32: dbang bzhi'i dkyil 'khor lha las blang //
T02TD2205E:173a-33: yang na nam mkha'i dbyings su blang //
T02TD2205E:173a-34: thos dang bsam pas bdag nyid 'jug pa'o //
T02TD2205E:173a-35: de nas slob ma gzhug par bya //
T02TD2205E:173a-36: phyi rol khrus kyi cho ga bya //
T02TD2205E:173a-37: bum par gyur dang rdzas rnams dgram //
T02TD2205E:173a-38: ci 'byor yon rnams dbul bar bya //
T02TD2205E:173a-39: sems bskyed sdom pa la sogs sngon bzhin bya //
T02TD2205E:173a-40: sdom pa legs par 'dzin pa la //
T02TD2205E:173a-41: bka' bsgo dam tshig bdud rtsi blud //
T02TD2205E:173a-43: gos sngon dkyil 'khor chen por chud //
T02TD2205E:173a-44: nga yis khyod la dngos grub 'byung //
T02TD2205E:173a-45: sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyis rlob //
T02TD2205E:173b-0: ces ba ni spro ba @173b bskyed pa'o //
T02TD2205E:173b-2: sems can dad pa med pa dang //
T02TD2205E:173b-3: gang yang log chos spyod pa dang //
T02TD2205E:173b-4: mnar med ngan song rgyud can dang //
T02TD2205E:173b-5: rna bar ming yang bsgrag mi bya //
T02TD2205E:173b-6: zhes pa ni gdams ngag go //
T02TD2205E:173b-7: gal te de la smras gyur na //
T02TD2205E:173b-8: dam can chad pas bcad nas ni //
T02TD2205E:173b-10: mnar med dmyal bar myur du dengs //
T02TD2205E:173b-11: gos sngon chen pos mdo la spong //
T02TD2205E:173b-12: zhes pa 'di ni skyon bstan pa'o //
T02TD2205E:173b-13: de nas snying nang sems dpa' bskyed //
T02TD2205E:173b-14: bdud rtsi lnga dang sbyar ba'am //
T02TD2205E:173b-15: yang na dri yi chu blud de //
T02TD2205E:173b-17: dam las 'das na sreg par byed //
T02TD2205E:173b-18: dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub ni //
T02TD2205E:173b-19: rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu yis 'grub //
T02TD2205E:173b-20: aom badzra sa tva h'um ma h'a panytsa aa mra ta //
T02TD2205E:173b-21: kha kha zhes pa ni mna' bsgags pa'o //
T02TD2205E:173b-22: de ring phan chad bu khyod kyis //
T02TD2205E:173b-23: gsang chen rdo rje nga yin gyis //
T02TD2205E:173b-24: nga la ba rnyas par ma byed cig / gal te brnyas par gyur na ni //
T02TD2205E:173b-25: sangs rgyas thams cad mnyen pa min //
T02TD2205E:173b-27: dmyal bar skye bar gdon mi za //
T02TD2205E:173b-28: zhes pa ni man ngag go ;
T02TD2205E:173b-29: ; de nas rdo rje slob ma yis //
T02TD2205E:173b-30: slob dpon la ni gsol ba gdab //
T02TD2205E:173b-31: chos dbyings byin rlabs las byung ba'i //
T02TD2205E:173b-32: bcom ldan rdo rje chad chen po //
T02TD2205E:173b-33: de ring bdag la dbab tu gsol //
T02TD2205E:173b-35: de nas slob ma mtha' yas la //
T02TD2205E:173b-36: ram dang bcas pa'i yi ge bsam //
T02TD2205E:173b-37: bskyod nas drod bskul chu la phog / bskol bas sa yi dkyil 'khor zhu //
T02TD2205E:173b-38: lus nang me yis bsreg byas nas //
T02TD2205E:173b-39: sdig pa tshig par gyur pa dang //
T02TD2205E:173b-40: bde gshegs byang chub sems phab ste //
T02TD2205E:173b-41: snying gnam lus nang 'khyil par bsam //
T02TD2205E:173b-42: de nas rdo rje 'chang chen bsgom //
T02TD2205E:173b-43: me tog dkyil 'khor lha la dbul //
T02TD2205E:173b-44: pra t'i tshtsa ho zhes brjod //
T02TD2205E:173b-45: de nas phreng ba mgo la bcing //
T02TD2205E:173b-46: aom ma h'a ba la badzra //
T02TD2205E:173b-47: aa bhi shi nyts'a mi zhe'o //
T02TD2205E:173b-48: rmad byung gsang ba'i me tog 'di //
T02TD2205E:173b-49: gsang la babs pa rigs kyi lha //
T02TD2205E:174a-2: gtso bo'i thugs sogs mchog dngos grub //
T02TD2205E:174a-3: dbus dang nyen dngos grub nye //
T02TD2205E:174a-4: ring na dngos grub ster bar 'gyur //
T02TD2205E:174a-5: zhes pa la sogs pa ni dbab pa'i cho ga dang me tog go //
T02TD2205E:174a-6: dpal ldan chen po gos sngon can //
T02TD2205E:174a-7: khyod kyi mig dbye ba brtson par mdzod //
T02TD2205E:174a-8: tsakshu pra be sha ya phat /
T02TD2205E:174a-9: brtab pa'i lta bas blta byas te //
T02TD2205E:174a-11: ser po mthong na rgyas pa 'grub //
T02TD2205E:174a-12: dmar po mthong na dbang gi las //
T02TD2205E:174a-14: khyod kyi mig gis ji ltar mthong //
T02TD2205E:174a-16: / deng nas brtsams te dpal ldan che //
T02TD2205E:174a-17: khyab nas brtsams te dkyil 'khor bstan //
T02TD2205E:174a-19: yon phul gsol ba gdab par bya //
T02TD2205E:174a-20: ji ltar dus gsum sangs rgyas la //
T02TD2205E:174a-21: rdo rje sems dpas dbang bskur ltar //
T02TD2205E:174a-22: bdag kyang rab tu bsgral slad du ;
T02TD2205E:174a-23: / bde gshegs bum pa'i dbang mchog stsol //
T02TD2205E:174a-24: zhes pa ni gsol ba gdab pa'o //
T02TD2205E:174a-25: de nas rdo rje rgyal po yis //
T02TD2205E:174a-26: bum pa'i chu ni bsdus byas te //
T02TD2205E:174a-27: byang chub sems kyi ngo bo dag //
T02TD2205E:174a-28: rol mo'i sgra dang bcas pa yis //
T02TD2205E:174a-29: spyi gtsug dag tu dbang bskur ro //
T02TD2205E:174a-30: aom gsang ba gsum las legs byung ba'i //
T02TD2205E:174a-31: lha yi chu ni dag pa yis //
T02TD2205E:174a-32: dri med rdo rje chu dbang gis //
T02TD2205E:174a-33: mi bskyod dngos grub thob par shog / aom sarba ta th'a ta a'a da rsha aa bhi shi nyts'a mi /
T02TD2205E:174a-35: aom sangs rgyas byin rlabs las byung ba'i //
T02TD2205E:174a-36: yid bzhin nor bu 'bar ba che //
T02TD2205E:174a-37: dam pa thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas //
T02TD2205E:174a-38: rin chen grub pa'i dbang bskur ro //
T02TD2205E:174a-39: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta ratna badzra aa bhi shi nyts'a mi //
T02TD2205E:174a-40: zhes pa ni dbu rgyan gyi dbang ngo //
T02TD2205E:174a-41: aom ye shes lnga yis rtags 'chang ba //
T02TD2205E:174a-42: thugs mchog rdo rje bla med pa'i //
T02TD2205E:174a-43: dus gsum 'gyur ba med pa yi //
T02TD2205E:174a-44: snang ba mtha' yas dbang bskur ro //
T02TD2205E:174a-45: aom sarba ta th'a ga tas samana aa bhi shi nyts'a mi /
T02TD2205E:174a-46: zhes pa ni rdo rje'i dbang ngo //
T02TD2205E:174a-47: aom chos sku sgyu ma'i sgra sgrogs shing //
T02TD2205E:174a-48: stong pa'i don las sad par byed //
T02TD2205E:174a-49: bla med dril bu'i dbang bskur bas //
T02TD2205E:174b-0: don yod grub pa'i dngos grub shog / aom sarba ta th'a ga ta kri t'a nu shth'a aa @174b bhi shinyts'a mi /
T02TD2205E:174b-1: zhes pa ni dril bu'i dbang po //
T02TD2205E:174b-2: kye rdo rje'i ming gis dbang bskur bas //
T02TD2205E:174b-3: cis kyang mi tshugs mi shigs pa'i //
T02TD2205E:174b-4: byang chub chen po thob pa dang //
T02TD2205E:174b-5: rnam par snang mdzad dngos grub shog / aom sarba ta th'a ga ta shi sa ma ya dzny'a ta n'a ma aa bhi shinyts'a mi /
T02TD2205E:174b-6: zhes pa ni ming gi dbang ngo //
T02TD2205E:174b-7: chos rnams sgyu ma lta bu ste //
T02TD2205E:174b-8: dag cing gsal la rtog pa med //
T02TD2205E:174b-9: mi long gi ni gzugs brnyan bzhin //
T02TD2205E:174b-10: rang byung lha ni shes par gyis //
T02TD2205E:174b-11: zhes pa ni me long ngo //
T02TD2205E:174b-13: dang po gsol ba gdab ba ste //
T02TD2205E:174b-14: gsan nas ye shes 'khor lo gzhug / sdig pa dag par chus bkrus te ;
T02TD2205E:174b-15: / so so'i dbang rdzas lag tu sbyin //
T02TD2205E:174b-16: nyon mongs lnga yi dri ma bskur //
T02TD2205E:174b-17: dbu la rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas dgod //
T02TD2205E:174b-20: rdo rje'i dbang gis mngon sangs rgyas //
T02TD2205E:174b-21: ye shes lnga dang rdo rje 'di //
T02TD2205E:174b-22: khyod kyis rtag tu bcang par gyis //
T02TD2205E:174b-23: zhes pa thugs kyi dam tshig go //
T02TD2205E:174b-24: gsung rnams sgra brnyan lta bu ste //
T02TD2205E:174b-25: rtog pa med pas sna tshogs sgra //
T02TD2205E:174b-26: brjod bral dpag gis mi lang pa'i //
T02TD2205E:174b-27: dril bu 'di ni khyod kyis zung //
T02TD2205E:174b-28: zhes pa ni gsung gi dam tshig go //
T02TD2205E:174b-29: thabs dang shes rab gnyis med sgra //
T02TD2205E:174b-30: mi phyed rdo rje'i ngo bo 'di //
T02TD2205E:174b-31: 'khyud pa'i phyag rgya'i dam tshig ste //
T02TD2205E:174b-32: khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang //
T02TD2205E:174b-33: zhes pa ni sku'i dam tshig go //
T02TD2205E:174b-34: 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad dang //
T02TD2205E:174b-35: dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin la gnas //
T02TD2205E:174b-36: khyid kyis kyang ni rtag tu bzang //
T02TD2205E:174b-37: phyag na rdo rje'i brtul zhugs brtan //
T02TD2205E:174b-38: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra pa'i ni h'um ma h'a ya ksha se n'a pa ta ye h'um ta ye h'um ha ha ha ha hi //
T02TD2205E:174b-39: zhes pa 'di ni rdo rje'i brtul zhugs so //
T02TD2205E:174b-40: chags dang grol ba'i gang zag gis //
T02TD2205E:174b-41: thun mong dkyil 'khor cho ga yin //
T02TD2205E:174b-42: gang zag rnam pa gnyis po de //
T02TD2205E:174b-44: dngos grub gnyis dang 'brel bar byed //
T02TD2205E:174b-45: klu dang 'byung pos zin pa la ;
T02TD2205E:174b-46: / dang po cho ga sngon song nas //
T02TD2205E:174b-47: smre ba'i rdzas kyis dbral bar bya //
T02TD2205E:174b-48: de nas bral ba gso ba dang //
T02TD2205E:174b-49: nad pa chu yis bskur bar bya //
T02TD2205E:174b-51: zhugs pa tsam gyis myur du thar //
T02TD2205E:174b-52: rims dang 'brum bu la sogs pa //
T02TD2205E:174b-53: gtor ma'i 'khor lo sngon song bas //
T02TD2205E:175a-1: myur du nyen las thar bar 'gyur //
T02TD2205E:175a-2: bud med dag kyang bu 'dod na //
T02TD2205E:175a-3: dang po cho ga sngon sogs nas //
T02TD2205E:175a-4: khur skyis dag nas gos bzang bgo //
T02TD2205E:175a-6: bus pa'i gdon rnams bzlog pa dang //
T02TD2205E:175a-7: bus pa dbyung bar gdon mi za //
T02TD2205E:175a-8: yid gas bkol ba'i cho ga yang //
T02TD2205E:175a-9: lha la sogs pa bkug gyur nas //
T02TD2205E:175a-10: sdom pa legs par bzung nas ni //
T02TD2205E:175a-12: bdag gis bcol ba thams cad de //
T02TD2205E:175a-13: thogs ba med pa'i rdo rje bzhin //
T02TD2205E:175a-14: ro yi las rnams byed 'dod pas //
T02TD2205E:175a-15: blang dang bsrung ba sngon song nas //
T02TD2205E:175a-16: dkyil 'khor 'di ru bcu ga gyur na //
T02TD2205E:175a-17: log chos drug dang ldan pa yang //
T02TD2205E:175a-18: gtsang ba'i gnas su nye bar 'gro //
T02TD2205E:175a-19: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs la //
T02TD2205E:175a-20: dang pa'i cho ga sngon song nas //
T02TD2205E:175a-22: dbang bskur mchod ba phul gyur na //
T02TD2205E:175a-23: shin tu bkra shis don ldan te //
T02TD2205E:175a-24: bskur zhig bstim pa'i gnas su 'gyur //
T02TD2205E:175a-26: chags lam pa dang grol lam pa //
T02TD2205E:175a-27: mdzes rims kyis zin pa dang //
T02TD2205E:175a-28: bud med dang ni yi dags bskol //
T02TD2205E:175a-29: ro dang sku gzugs lhag par gnas //
T02TD2205E:175a-31: de phyir dkyil 'khor cho ga brgyad //
T02TD2205E:175a-32: gcig par bsdu ba'i cho ga'o /
T02TD2205E:175a-34: // / de nas gsang ba'i dbang bskur te //
T02TD2205E:175a-35: de yang bdud rtsi lnga yas byung //
T02TD2205E:175a-36: stegs bu'i steng du slob dpon dang //
T02TD2205E:175a-37: phyag rgya ma ni snyoms par zhugs //
T02TD2205E:175a-38: slob mas de la gsol ba ga dab //
T02TD2205E:175a-39: aom rgyal ba thams cad rol pa yis //
T02TD2205E:175a-40: sangs rgyas chu yis rgyun phab ste //
T02TD2205E:175a-41: nyon mongs rtog pa sbyar ba bzhin //
T02TD2205E:175a-42: bdag la byang chub sems dbang gsol //
T02TD2205E:175a-43: ji ltar rgyal ba'i dbu skabs pa //
T02TD2205E:175a-44: byang chub sems kyis bskus pa bzhin //
T02TD2205E:175a-45: bdag la byang chub sems khrus gsol //
T02TD2205E:175a-46: zhes pa ni gsol ba gdab pa'o //
T02TD2205E:175a-47: de nas blo ldan slob dpon dang //
T02TD2205E:175a-48: slob ma gnyis med sbyor byas pa'i //
T02TD2205E:175a-49: byang chub sems su dgang gsungs pa //
T02TD2205E:175a-50: yum gyi bha gar blang bar bya //
T02TD2205E:175b-0: dper na bud ba me tog @175b bzhin ;
T02TD2205E:175b-1: / yang na gsang ba'i rdo rje sker //
T02TD2205E:175b-2: sbom pos dbang po gnyis mnan te //
T02TD2205E:175b-3: slob ma'i kha ru dab ba bar bya //
T02TD2205E:175b-4: dper rna ma la bu bzhin no //
T02TD2205E:175b-5: yang na slob ma gang yin pa //
T02TD2205E:175b-6: gdugs la sogs dang ldan byas nas //
T02TD2205E:175b-7: gsang chen bde ba'i rgyu mchog ste //
T02TD2205E:175b-8: bdud rtsi lnga dang ldan byas nas ;
T02TD2205E:175b-9: / bkra shis bstod pas bstod pa dang //
T02TD2205E:175b-10: slob ma'i lce la sbyin par bya //
T02TD2205E:175b-11: de nas slob mched po de //
T02TD2205E:175b-12: byang chub ba dud rtsi lces blangs nas //
T02TD2205E:175b-13: snying gar 'dod pa bsten par bya //
T02TD2205E:175b-14: bde ba de la brten gyur nas //
T02TD2205E:175b-15: lte ba'i dbus su bsam par bya //
T02TD2205E:175b-16: slob mas kyang ni 'di skad brjod ;
T02TD2205E:175b-17: /'chi bar gyur par rab slong zhing //
T02TD2205E:175b-18: rtog pa'i dra ba sel mdzad pa //
T02TD2205E:175b-19: ae ma mchog gi bdud rtse che //
T02TD2205E:175b-20: bzhi brgya rgya bzhi'i nad sel zhing //
T02TD2205E:175b-21: bla med byang chub mchog la reg / bdud rtsi mnga' bdag khyod la bstod //
T02TD2205E:175b-22: gsang chen dbyings la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02TD2205E:175b-23: bcud ldan bdud rtsi khyod la bstod //
T02TD2205E:175b-24: ces pa ni gsang ba'i dbang ngo //
T02TD2205E:175b-25: de nas shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur te /
T02TD2205E:175b-26: mandala dri zhim legs byung te //
T02TD2205E:175b-27: mchog tu dkar dmar thig le gdab //
T02TD2205E:175b-28: steng du mtshan ldan bud med bzhag / gnas rnams su ni lha tshogs dgod //
T02TD2205E:175b-29: dbyings nas bstim pa'i cho ga bya //
T02TD2205E:175b-30: de nas slob mas gsol ba gdab //
T02TD2205E:175b-31: ji ltar sangs rgyas thams cad kun //
T02TD2205E:175b-32: shes ba pha rol phyin pas 'grub //
T02TD2205E:175b-33: bdag kyang rab tu bsgral slad du //
T02TD2205E:175b-34: gsum pa'i dkyil 'khor bstan du gsol //
T02TD2205E:175b-35: zhes pa ni gsol ba gdab pa'o //
T02TD2205E:175b-36: bu tshur shog cig rigs kyi bu ;
T02TD2205E:175b-37: / gang ltar dga' ba'i dngos grub ni //
T02TD2205E:175b-38: shes rab ma la brten nas 'grub //
T02TD2205E:175b-39: rtag tu shes rab don 'dod pas //
T02TD2205E:175b-40: padma'i steng gi lce yis reg / dri chen dri chu bza' bar bya //
T02TD2205E:175b-41: tha dad rtog pa gyur mi bya //
T02TD2205E:175b-42: khu ba dkar dmar rnam pa gnyis //
T02TD2205E:175b-43: lce yi dbus su brtan par gzung//
T02TD2205E:175b-44: dka' thub med cing brtul zhugs che //
T02TD2205E:175b-47: pa ni sngom pa dbog pa'o //
T02TD2205E:175b-48: de nas slob ma chen po des //
T02TD2205E:175b-49: rang gi bsam pa'i blo ba rtags pa //
T02TD2205E:175b-50: ji ltar sngom pa gzung bar bya //
T02TD2205E:176a-2: rtag tu gcer bu'i tshul can gyis //
T02TD2205E:176a-3: rdo rje dri la bu kha phye la //
T02TD2205E:176a-4: mthong ba'i slob ma gsol ba gang ba //
T02TD2205E:176a-5: rmad byung btsun mo'i bha ga mchog / ye shes thams cad bskyed pa'i gnas //
T02TD2205E:176a-6: ma smin ma grol grol ba'i sar //
T02TD2205E:176a-7: ye shes dam pa bskyed du gsol ;
T02TD2205E:176a-8: / zhes pa ni gsol ba gang ba pa'o //
T02TD2205E:176a-9: de nas bde ba'i stan bting la //
T02TD2205E:176a-10: seng ge'i stabs kyis nyal ba yis //
T02TD2205E:176a-11: lag pa steng 'og bsnol nas ni //
T02TD2205E:176a-12: mchog dga' ba yi gtam dang ldan //
T02TD2205E:176a-13: gnas dgu ru ni sen mo gdab //
T02TD2205E:176a-14: thur gyis smeg dang kha spad stsogs //
T02TD2205E:176a-15: chags pa bskyod pa'i chog bya ;
T02TD2205E:176a-16: / yum gyi bya rgod rtse mo mchog / dbang po'i lag pas blang bar bya //
T02TD2205E:176a-17: padma kha byer gyur pa dang //
T02TD2205E:176a-18: gnyis su med par sbyar gyur te //
T02TD2205E:176a-19: bskyod pa dal gyis bskyod par bya //
T02TD2205E:176a-20: bskyod pa'i rlung gis me bskul de //
T02TD2205E:176a-21: bde chen byang chub sems phab ste //
T02TD2205E:176a-22: so so'i gnas su 'od tshan gzung //
T02TD2205E:176a-23: rdo rje ru phyin pa dang //
T02TD2205E:176a-25: aom khyod kyis stobs kyis thams cad 'dus //
T02TD2205E:176a-26: log pa'i man dag der bsam mo //
T02TD2205E:176a-27: ma bzlog pa ni lce yis blang //
T02TD2205E:176a-28: ma bzlog pa ni lces yis blang //
T02TD2205E:176a-29: gal te bzlog par gyur pa na //
T02TD2205E:176a-30: rtog pa thams cad nub par 'gyur //
T02TD2205E:176a-31: de las langs te de bzhin bsam //
T02TD2205E:176a-32: shes rab ye shes kyi dbang ngo //
T02TD2205E:176a-33: de nas lung bstan par bya ste //
T02TD2205E:176a-34: khams gsum 'gro rnams thams cad la //
T02TD2205E:176a-35: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya //
T02TD2205E:176a-36: dus 'di nas ni bzung nas ni //
T02TD2205E:176a-37: srid pa'i gzeb las sgrol bar 'gyur //
T02TD2205E:176a-38: nyon mongs sdug bsngal gtan bcad nas //
T02TD2205E:176a-39: bla med byang chub mchog la reg / de ring phan chad bu khyod ni ;
T02TD2205E:176a-40: / rgyal ba'i sras kyi thu bo yin //
T02TD2205E:176a-41: zhes pa ni lung bstan pa dang dbugs dbyung ba'o //
T02TD2205E:176a-43: de ltar chos kyi 'khor lo bskor //
T02TD2205E:176a-44: khams gsum sems cad thams cad la //
T02TD2205E:176a-47: dung dang ral gri padmo dang ;
T02TD2205E:176a-48: / rdo rje la sogs pa 'di ni rjes su gnang ba'o //
T02TD2205E:176a-49: de nas sob ma dam pa des //
T02TD2205E:176a-50: rin chen gser dngul gyi ru dang //
T02TD2205E:176a-51: dung dang mu tig ku mu ta //
T02TD2205E:176a-52: ba lang rta dang glang po che //
T02TD2205E:176a-53: yul dang bu smad la sogs pa //
T02TD2205E:176a-54: mdor na rang las gces pa'i rdzas //
T02TD2205E:176a-55: thams cad bla ma de la dbul //
T02TD2205E:176b-0: @176b bla ma dam par gyur pa //
T02TD2205E:176b-1: rang drog gis kyang mnyes byed na /
T02TD2205E:176b-2: gzhan pa'i rdzas lta smos ci dgos //
T02TD2205E:176b-3: zhes pa ni yod dbul ba'o //
T02TD2205E:176b-4: de nas dam tshig dpog bya ste //
T02TD2205E:176b-5: gsang dang don dam yang dag la //
T02TD2205E:176b-6: thob par gyur pa'i slob ma yis //
T02TD2205E:176b-7: dam tshig yid bzhin nor bu bsrung //
T02TD2205E:176b-8: yang dag rdo rje slob dpon la //
T02TD2205E:176b-9: mid ge log pa spyod 'dod na //
T02TD2205E:176b-10: de ni dbang gis tshig nas ltung //
T02TD2205E:176b-11: thun mong khyad par mched dang yum //
T02TD2205E:176b-12: de la ngan sems gzung mi bya //
T02TD2205E:176b-13: slob dpon rdo rje mched gyur la //
T02TD2205E:176b-14: rang gi srog kyang phan gdags na //
T02TD2205E:176b-15: sgrib pa kun byang tshogs rdzogs nas //
T02TD2205E:176b-16: bar chod thams cad zhi bar 'gyur //
T02TD2205E:176b-17: de min dbang gis tshig nas ltung //
T02TD2205E:176b-18: byang chub sems ni spang mi bya //
T02TD2205E:176b-19: dge slong khrims la lhag par gnas //
T02TD2205E:176b-20: sngom ba thams cad lhag par bsrung //
T02TD2205E:176b-22: rnal 'byor pa yi rdzas rnams la /
T02TD2205E:176b-23: rtog pa thams cad spang par bya //
T02TD2205E:176b-24: gzhan yang dam tshig mtha' yas pa //
T02TD2205E:176b-25: thams cad 'bad de bsrung bar bya //
T02TD2205E:176b-26: dam tshig dngos grub kun gyis mchog / dam tshig dngos grub kun gyi bdag / dam tshig gis ni 'byung po 'dul //
T02TD2205E:176b-27: dam tshig rtog pa'i dra ba gcod //
T02TD2205E:176b-28: gang dag dam tshig mi ldan pa //
T02TD2205E:176b-29: dbang gis tshig nas mnar med par //
T02TD2205E:176b-30: sangs rgyas bzhugs kyi bar du gnas //
T02TD2205E:176b-31: zhas pa ni dam tshig dpog pa'o //
T02TD2205E:176b-32: deng nas brtsams te bkra shis kyi //
T02TD2205E:176b-33: smon lam rjes su gdab par bya //
T02TD2205E:176b-34: bum pa'i lha dang dkyil 'khor lha //
T02TD2205E:176b-35: sbyang dang nam mkhar gshegs su gsol //
T02TD2205E:176b-36: dam tshig dkyil 'khor rang la bsdu //
T02TD2205E:176b-37: dkyil 'khor phyag la chu bor dbo //
T02TD2205E:176b-38: snod rnams dag par bkru bar bya //
T02TD2205E:176b-39: rang nyid mi dmigs dbyings su bsdu //
T02TD2205E:176b-40: de la las kyi lhar bsgyur la //
T02TD2205E:176b-41: bzod gsol lus srung cho ga bya //
T02TD2205E:176b-43: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i don la rmongs //
T02TD2205E:176b-44: yang dag don dang mi ldan zhing //
T02TD2205E:176b-45: 'dod ngal log pa'i lam zhugs dan //
T02TD2205E:176b-46: dka' thub pa dang rtog ba can //
T02TD2205E:176b-47: de la zur tsam bstan mi bya //
T02TD2205E:176b-48: gal te de la bstan gyur na //
T02TD2205E:176b-49: tshe yi 'du byed des bkum nas //
T02TD2205E:176b-50: dmyal bar bskal pa stong du gnas //
T02TD2205E:177a-2: / sgrub pa'i thabs 'di brtsams par mi 'os kyang //
T02TD2205E:177a-3: sems can bdag pas dam phyir bdag gis brtsams //
T02TD2205E:177a-4: 'di las bdag gis byang chub ci thob pa //
T02TD2205E:177a-5: des ni sems can gos sngon grub par shog / bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis //
T02TD2205E:177a-6: khams gsum sems can thams cad kun //
T02TD2205E:177a-7: zhang mchog gtsang mar skye bar shog / dbang gi 'bras bu smin gyur cig / sems can las dang skal ldan nas //
T02TD2205E:177a-8: rdo rje 'chang chen zhal mthong shog / de yi theg pa'i don rtogs te //
T02TD2205E:177a-9: mtshon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas //
T02TD2205E:177a-10: thugs rje chen po'i byin rlabs kyis ;
T02TD2205E:177a-11: / sems can 'gro don byed par shog / dpal ldan gos sngon can gyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga slob dpon n'a g'a rdzu nas mdzad pa rdzogs so//
